source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_00<tab>Minfilia would share with you the latest news on the Scions' imminent relocation.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_00<tab>砂の家のミンフィリアは、冒険者に説明したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_01<tab>Alphinaud's efforts having proved successful, the Scions have secured a new location for their headquarters: Revenant's Toll in Mor Dhona. Minfilia would begin preparations for the move immediately, as there is much that still must be done. Pay visit to her and see if there is aught you might do to be of service.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_01<tab>レヴナンツトールへ本部施設を移転させる計画が、ついに動き出した。砂の家の「ミンフィリア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_02<tab>Minfilia has entrusted you with a number of documents pertaining to the forthcoming move to Mor Dhona. You are to deliver them to Slafborn at Revenant's Toll, in accordance with the agreement between the Scions and the Adventurers' Guild.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_02<tab>ミンフィリアと話した。彼女と賢人たちは、本部施設移転の準備に忙しいようだ。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールにいる「スラフボーン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_03<tab>Slafborn is pleased that you were the Scion chosen to represent the order in Revenant's Toll, and waggishly declares that he intends to impose the work of a dozen men upon you, though he subsequently claims to be jesting. At any rate, it would appear the Scions' long-awaited relocation effort can finally begin in earnest.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SEQ_03<tab>スラフボーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903501 /var>を渡すことができた。これで本部施設移転に一歩前進だ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the documents to Slafborn in Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_TODO_01<tab>レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>受注するには、進行中のメインクエストを破棄する必要があります。
メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」から、
「ジャーナル」を選び、破棄してください。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_000<tab>It is all well and good that we have found ourselves a new home in Revenant's Toll. But there is so much to be done─and in so little time.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_000<tab>本部を移転すると決めたら決めたで、
やることがいっぱいね……。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_001<tab>Our first step will be to secure the cooperation of the Adventurers' Guild representatives there.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_001<tab>アルフィノが移転先として挙げていた、
モードゥナのレヴナンツトール……。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_002<tab>Were it not for the guild's considerable efforts, the original Camp Revenant's Toll would have never been established, much less its more heavily fortified successor.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_002<tab>あの拠点の西に「崩壊したキャンプ」があるのを知っている？
あそこには、第七霊災で崩壊する前まで、
「キャンプ・レヴナンツトール」という拠点があったわ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_003<tab>However, with construction still ongoing, and resources in short supply, it seems certain that the guild will require something in return for their support, sympathetic to our cause though they may be.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_003<tab>そして、今のレヴナンツトールは、
失われたキャンプの機能を取り戻すべく、
「冒険者ギルド」が主体となって復興を進めている集落よ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_004<tab>Whatever they ask, I shall not begrudge it. To be plain, we need them more than they need us. Without their assistance, such essential tasks as securing new facilities, cultivating relationships with local merchants, and recruiting adventurers would prove difficult, if not impossible.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_004<tab>……レヴナンツトールへ移転するとなれば、
彼らとの協力体制は必要不可欠。
冒険者ギルド本部とも話さなきゃいけないわ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>You need not concern yourself with such matters, Antecedent.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>そう思って手配しておいたよ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_006<tab>Really, Alphinaud─if I need concern myself with <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var>, it is surely matters such as these.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_006<tab>相変わらずやることが早いわね。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ALPHINAUD_000_007<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Indirectly<var 1A 01 /var>, perhaps. I submit that you might instead concern yourself with a different matter: namely, to whom the resolution of such matters might best be entrusted. And here I am! Nor do I come alone. May I present the esteemed emissary of the Adventurers' Guild at Revenant's Toll.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ALPHINAUD_000_007<tab>きっと君がその気になってくれると思ってね。
話をするなら、早いほうが良いだろう？

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_008<tab>It is an honor, Antecedent. Upon receiving word of your intentions from Master Alphinaud, we thought it best to begin talks at the earliest available opportunity.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_008<tab>話はアルフィノ殿から伺っている。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_009<tab>Know that my associates at Revenant's Toll hold the Scions of the Seventh Dawn in the highest regard. We should be honored to welcome your organization.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_009<tab>ともにレヴナンツトールを盛り上げていくため、
良い話になることを期待している。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>There are, of course, certain provisions which must needs be negotiated. If it please you, I would do so.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>冒険者ギルドとの話は、私の方で進めておこう。
ミンフィリア、君は賢人たちや他の人員への、
方針の説明と関係機関への根回しを、お願いしたい。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_012<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>, unless I am much mistaken, you are the one known as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are you not? May I say what a pleasure it is to make your acquaintance.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_012<tab>君が<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>か。
……うむ、良い顔をしているな。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_013<tab>Slafborn spoke of you in the most glowing terms. To steal an imperial reaper and then use it to infiltrate a Garlean castrum is an undertaking few would contemplate─and fewer still survive.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_013<tab>レヴナンツトールで冒険者ギルドの顔役をしている
スラフボーンから、君の噂は聞いているよ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_014<tab>You shall always be welcome at Revenant's Toll. We hope you will favor us with your presence again ere long.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_ADVEMISSARY_000_014<tab>これから、レヴナンツトールを発展させていこう。
よろしくな！

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_015<tab>Well, well! It would seem your reputation precedes you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Mayhap I <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var> dispatch you to Revenant's Toll with all haste, as first intended...
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_015<tab>さて、やることはいっぱいだけど、
ひとつひとつ片付けていかなきゃね！

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_016<tab>But before that, I daresay you have earned yourself a rest. After all, you have traveled so far, and there is already so much you have done for us...and for me.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_016<tab>わたしたちが準備している間、あなたは少し休んでおいて。
ラミンを探すために、ラノシアまで足を運んでくれたのでしょう？

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_017<tab>We will speak again anon. Till then, take care.

TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_110<tab>Do you ever wonder how he does it? Alphinaud, I mean. It was almost predictable that he should appear with an emissary of the Adventurers' Guild mere moments after I had expressed the need to forge ties between our organizations. Truly, his sense of timing rivals even your own...
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_110<tab>移転を決めた途端、アルフィノから実務を山ほど渡されたわ。
まったく、彼の手際の良さには感心するわね。
……先見の明？　それとも、一日の長なのかしら？

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_111<tab>Setting such mysteries aside for the present─I have a task for you.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_111<tab>ともかく、わたしもタタルさんも賢者のみんなも手一杯。
あなたにも、ひとつ頼まれてほしいの。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_112<tab>I would like you to deliver these documents to Slafborn. They concern our forthcoming move. Do take care on the road, and represent us well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_MINFILIA_000_112<tab>この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903501 /var>」を
レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンさんに届けてくれるかしら？
大事な書類だから、失くさないように気を付けてね。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SLAFBORN_000_120<tab>I was told to expect a Scion, but I didn't expect it to be you. It has been far too long, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have something for me, yes?
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SLAFBORN_000_120<tab>こんな辺境の……と、お前か、冒険者。
「暁」からの連絡を待っているのだが……
もしや、お前がその連絡役かな？

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SLAFBORN_000_121<tab>Let's see, now... Yes, everything appears to be in order.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SLAFBORN_000_121<tab>……ふむ、なるほど。
「暁」が正式に公の組織として活動を開始するにあたり、
本部施設をレヴナンツトールに移設したい、と……。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SLAFBORN_000_122<tab>You'll be staying with us for a while, yes? Would that we had a dozen more like you. Since we don't, though, we'll just give you the work of a dozen men. Heh! I jest, I jest...
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE106_03876_SLAFBORN_000_122<tab>うむ、書類上は何ら問題はないようだ。
連絡役ご苦労だったな、冒険者。
